text: Inauguration ceremony of the 28th POLA Summit (The Presidents of Law Associations in Asia) was held (July 22) under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.This summit which is organized by Sri Lanka Bar Association is held for three days in Colombo.During the summit attention will be paid on the problems faced by the lawyers in Asian Region. They will discuss about the solutions on this regard.Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, Minister Wijayadasa Rajapaksha and the President of the Bar Association U.
